Name: Word of Blake
ReputationStatements: Greetings, Seeker. Blakes Peace needs to be spread.
Mercenary, we got a Job for you and Money to waste. Do this and you will be compensated above your station.
The Word has come with proposition for a reliable Asset such as you.
Blake be with you. We have a cunning Plan that needs outside Help.
May Blake grant you Wisdom for we have Opportunities ahead.
Welcome Seeker, Blakes blessings shine on you.
Welcome Initiate, the Master has plans for you
MissionSuccessStatements: In Blakes Name you have done Well, Seeker.
GoodFaithFailureStatements: May Blake grant you Wisdom to learn from your mistakes.
BadFaithFailureStatements: Blakes Light got diminished today, may Yours not be Diminished either.
Description: The Word of Blake is a splinter faction of ComStar that was created out of a conservative backlash against the removal of ComStar's mystical and religious aspects.
